member.name: P:Ocaramba.BaseConfiguration.MediumTimeout
member.summary: Gets the java script or ajax waiting time [seconds].
member.example: How to use it: this.Driver.IsElementPresent(this.statusCodeHeader, BaseConfiguration.MediumTimeout);

member.name: P:Ocaramba.BaseConfiguration.LongTimeout
member.summary: Gets the page load waiting time [seconds].
member.example: How to use it: element.GetElement(locator, BaseConfiguration.LongTimeout, e => e.Displayed, customMessage);

member.name: P:Ocaramba.BaseConfiguration.ShortTimeout
member.summary: Gets the assertion waiting time [seconds].
member.example: How to use it: this.Driver.IsElementPresent(this.downloadPageHeader, BaseConfiguration.ShortTimeout);

member.name: P:Ocaramba.BaseConfiguration.ImplicitlyWaitMilliseconds
member.summary: Gets the Implicitly Wait time [milliseconds].

member.name: T:Ocaramba.Helpers.WaitHelper
member.summary: Contains wait methods with timeouts

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.WaitHelper.Wait(System.Func{System.Boolean},System.TimeSpan,System.String)
member.summary: Wait for a condition with given timeout.
member.param: The timeout value [seconds] indicating how long to wait for the condition.
member.exception: Timeout exception when condition is not met
member.example: How to use it: WaitHelper.Wait(() => CountFiles(folder, type) > filesNumber, TimeSpan.FromSeconds(waitTime), timeoutMessage);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.WaitHelper.Wait(System.Func{System.Boolean},System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan,System.String)
member.summary: Wait for a condition with given timeout and timeInterval.
member.param: The timeout value [seconds] indicating how long to wait for the condition.
The value [seconds] indicating how often to check for the condition to be true.
member.exception: Timeout exception when condition is not met
member.example: How to use it: WaitHelper.Wait(() => CountFiles(folder, type) > filesNumber, TimeSpan.FromSeconds(waitTime), TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1), timeoutMessage);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.WaitHelper.Wait(System.Func{System.Boolean},System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Wait for a condition with given timeout and timeInterval.
member.param: The timeout value [seconds] indicating how long to wait for the condition.
The value [seconds] indicating how often to check for the condition to be true.
member.returns: True if condition is met in given timeout
member.example: How to use it: bool result = WaitHelper.Wait(() => CountFiles(folder, type) > filesNumber, TimeSpan.FromSeconds(waitTime), TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1));

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.FilesHelper.RenameFile(System.Double,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Rename the file and check if file was renamed with given timeout, shorten the name of file if needed be removing "_".
member.param: Timeout for checking if file was removed
member.returns: The new name in case its shorten
member.example: How to use it: string newName = FilesHelper.RenameFile(BaseConfiguration.ShortTimeout, "filename.txt", "newname.txt", this.DriverContext.DownloadFolder);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.FilesHelper.CopyFile(System.Double,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copy the file and check if file was copied with given timeout, shorten the name of file if needed be removing "_".
member.param: Timeout for checking if file was removed
member.returns: The new name in case its shorten
member.example: How to use it: FilesHelper.CopyFile(BaseConfiguration.ShortTimeout, fileName, newName, this.DriverContext.DownloadFolder);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.FilesHelper.CopyFile(System.Double,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copy the file and check if file was copied with given timeout, shorten the name of file if needed be removing "_".
member.param: Timeout for checking if file was removed
member.returns: The new name in case its shorten
member.example: How to use it: FilesHelper.CopyFile(BaseConfiguration.ShortTimeout, fileName, newName, this.DriverContext.DownloadFolder + "\\", this.DriverContext.DownloadFolder + "\\");

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.FilesHelper.DeleteFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Delete file in given folder if exists.
member.example: How to use it: FilesHelper.DeleteFile("filename.txt", this.DriverContext.DownloadFolder);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.FilesHelper.RenameFile(System.String,System.String,System.String,Ocaramba.Helpers.FileType)
member.summary: Rename the file of given type and check if file was renamed with ShortTimeout, shorten the name of file if needed be removing "_".
member.returns: The new name in case its shorten
member.example: How to use it: string newName = FilesHelper.RenameFile("filename.txt", "newname", this.DriverContext.DownloadFolder, FileType.Csv);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.FilesHelper.GetFolder(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the folder from app.config as value of given key.
member.param: Directory where assembly files are located
member.example: How to use it: FilesHelper.GetFolder(BaseConfiguration.DownloadFolder, this.CurrentDirectory);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.TakeScreenShot.CutOutScreenShot(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Cut out the screen shot by giving locationX, locationY, elementWidth, elementHeight.
member.param: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the new rectangle.
The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the new rectangle.
The width of the new rectangle.
The height of the new rectangle
Full path to the screenshot to be cut out
member.returns: Full path of cutted out screenshot
member.example: How to use it: var fullPath = CutOutScreenShot(folder, screenshotName, locationX, locationY, elementWidth, elementHeight, fullPathToScreenShotToCutOut);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Helpers.NameHelper.ShortenFileName(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shortens the file name by removing occurrences of given pattern till length of folder + filename will be shorten than max Length.
member.param: The regular expression pattern to match
member.example: How to use it: NameHelper.ShortenFileName(folder, correctFileName, "_", 255);

member.summary: Remove all special characters except digit and letters.

member.returns: String with removed all special chracters
member.example: How to use it: var name = NameHelper.RemoveSpecialCharacters("country/region");

member.name: T:Ocaramba.Verify
member.summary: Class for assert without stop tests More details on wiki

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Verify.That(Ocaramba.DriverContext,System.Action[])
member.summary: Verify group of assets
member.example: How to use it: Verify.That( this.DriverContext, () => Assert.AreEqual(5 + 7 + 2, forgotPassword.EnterEmail(5, 7, 2)), () => Assert.AreEqual("Your e-mail's been sent!", forgotPassword.ClickRetrievePassword));

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Verify.That(Ocaramba.DriverContext,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Action[])
member.summary: Verify group of assets
member.example: How to use it: Verify.That( this.DriverContext, true, false, () => Assert.AreEqual(5 + 7 + 2, forgotPassword.EnterEmail(5, 7, 2)), () => Assert.AreEqual("Your e-mail's been sent!", forgotPassword.ClickRetrievePassword));

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Verify.That(Ocaramba.DriverContext,System.Action,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Verify assert conditions
member.example: How to use it: Verify.That(this.DriverContext, () => Assert.IsFalse(flag), true);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Verify.That(Ocaramba.DriverContext,System.Action)
member.summary: Verify assert conditions
member.example: How to use it: Verify.That(this.DriverContext, () => Assert.AreEqual(parameters["number"], links.CountLinks()));

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElement(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.String)
member.summary: Finds and waits for an element that is visible and displayed for long timeout.
member.param: Custom message to be displayed when there is no possible to get element
member.example: How to use it: this.Driver.GetElement(this.loginButton);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElement(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Double,System.String)
member.summary: Finds and waits for an element that is visible and displayed at specified time.
member.param: Custom message to be displayed when there is no possible to get element
member.example: How to use it: this.Driver.GetElement(this.loginButton, timeout);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElement(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Double)
member.summary: Finds and waits for an element that is visible and displayed at specified time.
member.example: How to use it: this.Driver.GetElement(this.loginButton, timeout);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElement(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Func{OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Boolean},System.String)
member.summary: Finds and waits for an element that meets specified conditions for long timeout.
member.param: Custom message to be displayed when there is no possible to get element
member.example: How to use it: this.Driver.GetElement(this.loginButton, e => e.Displayed);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElement(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Double,System.Func{OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Boolean},System.String)
member.summary: Finds and waits for an element that meets specified conditions at specified time.
member.param: Custom message to be displayed when there is no possible to get element
member.example: How to use it: this.Driver.GetElement(this.loginButton, timeout, e => e.Displayed);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElement(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Double,System.Double,System.Func{OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Boolean},System.String)
member.summary: Finds and waits for an element that meets specified conditions at specified time, recheck condition at specific time interval.
member.param: The value indicating how often to check for the condition to be true..
Custom message to be displayed when there is no possible to get element
member.example: How to use it: this.Driver.GetElement(this.loginButton, timeout, timeInterval, e => e.Displayed & e.Enabled);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElement``1(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.String)
member.summary: Finds and waits for an element that is visible and displayed for long timeout.
member.param: Custom message to be displayed when there is no possible to get element

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElement``1(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Double)
member.summary: Finds and waits for an element that is visible and displayed at specified time.

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElement``1(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Func{OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Boolean},System.String)
member.summary: Finds and waits for an element that meets specified conditions for long timeout.

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElement``1(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Double,System.Func{OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Boolean},System.String)
member.summary: Finds and waits for an element that meets specified conditions at specified time.
member.param: Custom message to be displayed when there is no possible to get element

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElements(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator)
member.summary: Finds elements that are enabled and displayed.
member.returns: Return all found and displayed and enabled elements
member.example: How to find elements : var checkboxes = this.Driver.GetElements(this.stackOverFlowCheckbox);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElements(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Double,System.Func{OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Boolean},System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds and waits for given timeout for at least minimum number of elements that meet specified conditions.
member.param: Condition to be fulfilled by elements
The minimum number of elements to get
member.returns: Return all found and displayed and enabled elements
member.example: How to find elements : var checkboxes = this.Driver.GetElements(this.stackOverFlowCheckbox, timeout, e => e.Displayed && e.Enabled, 1);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElements(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds and waits for LongTimeout timeout for at least minimum number of elements that are enabled and displayed.
member.param: The minimum number of elements to get
member.returns: Return all found and displayed and enabled elements
member.example: How to find elements : var checkboxes = this.Driver.GetElements(this.stackOverFlowCheckbox, 1);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElements(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Func{OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Finds elements that meet specified conditions.
member.param: Condition to be fulfilled by elements
member.returns: Return all found elements for specified conditions
member.example: How to find disabled elements : var checkboxes = this.Driver.GetElements(this.stackOverFlowCheckbox, e => e.Enabled == false);

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElements``1(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator)
member.summary: Finds elements that are visible and displayed.

member.name: M:Ocaramba.Extensions.SearchContextExtensions.GetElements``1(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,Ocaramba.Types.ElementLocator,System.Func{OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Finds elements that meet specified conditions.
